TopicTitle: I think I've been playing too much KSP - It's in my dreams

Articles.Content:
Last night I woke up and heard my girlfriend crying next to me, I asked her what was wrong, and she said she didn't know. I was still half asleep, and had just woken up from some sort of dream about orbiting in KSP, and I said, "would it help if I moved us into a higher orbit?"

I'm not sure what I was trying to say, but I'll tell you, it didn't help at all.

Anyway, she was okay after we talked more lucidly for a bit, but I still felt like an ass. It turned out she'd just had a nightmare, and that's why she'd been crying. She couldn't remember what it was about. Perhaps she'd been dreaming of her first fully manual docking attempt.

Gotta admit, I laughed pretty hard at the orbit bit. KSP gets into my dreams when I play it a lot too. Mostly just floating in space and screaming.

Currently having dreams about Payday 2 though.
Every time I try to solve some tricky problem in KSP it comes to me when I dream
Into dreams? I got ksp into real life when something is boring i'm just "searching" for warp key XD

Look at my signature.

Yes, I too had a dream about KSP

Oddly, before this dream, I had another from KSP that was something short. Like a scene. Okay, so it was a capsule that landed in the ocean, and it was being wabbled around and tossed by dynamic waves, IN WHICH IT WAS AWESOME!

Edited August 23, 2013 by AntonioAJC
That's weird, tonight I had a lucid dream about Snow White, and I was like "What the hell is going on here?", I haven't seen that movie in like 5 years.
Just happened to me last night. I've been obsessed with docking lately and that transferred over to the dream world. All I remember from it is working with a Clamp-o-Tron Sr.

Perhaps she'd been dreaming of her first fully manual docking attempt.

No wonder she cried. It is indeed a horrifying experience.

No wonder she cried. It is indeed a horrifying experience.

I remember my first docking attempt. It was before I knew what IJKL was for, so I only used H and N to carefully move towards the target. Oh, the horror!
i had a dream recently that i had to construct a craft to get to work on. Hahaha
Not as bad as the time I dreamed about Dwarf Fortress, in ASCII. Anyways, when you start to dream about a game, you know it is awesome.

i had a dream recently that i had to construct a craft to get to work on. Hahaha

This has happened to me. I striped of unessesary parts untill there were no parts left....
